snippet.title: Nightmare Reaper Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing our upcoming game, Nightmare Reaper!

Explore the cursed depths of a nightmare while finding powerful weapons and improving your abilities in this retro first person shooter that breaches the wall between the classics and modern sensibilities.

Episode 1 available summer 2019 in Early Access.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1051690

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/u2pdcGY

Twitter: https://twitter.com/NightmareReape4
